name: Fairy Tales Nightmare Escape
description:
Game Name: Fairy Tales Nightmare Escape

Description: In this game, your goal is to help the evil witch to solve the mysteries puzzle and find the secret gate to unleash the dark angel. Good Luck and Have Fun!
